quote: Our results provide a more accurate ability to estimate PFAS hepatotoxicity to provide guidance in chemical discovery of new PFAS and the development of new safety regulations.
This study advances the predictive modeling of PFAS toxicity by combining semi-supervised graph convolutional networks (GCNs) with molecular descriptors and fingerprints.
This study by Lai trained a model on existing PFAS to generate 260, 000 novel compounds as potential replacements for existing PFAS while favoring industrial suitability and lower toxicity.
